73 void VTKUnstructuredGrid::HomogeneousInfoStreamer::flushData( std::fstream &str, const std::string &name, VTKFormat format){
74 
75  assert( m_type != VTKElementType::UNDEFINED ) ;
76 
77  VTKDataType connectivityDataType = m_connectivity->getDataType();
78 
79  if( format == VTKFormat::APPENDED){
80 
81  if(name == "types" ){
82  uint8_t type = (uint8_t) m_type ;
83  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
84  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, type );
85  }
86 
87  } else if(name == "offsets" ){
88  uint8_t n = vtk::getElementNodeCount(m_type) ;
89  if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int64 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt64) {
90  uint64_t offset(0) ;
91  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
92  offset += n ;
93  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, offset );
94  }
95  } else if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int32 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt32) {
96  uint32_t offset(0) ;
97  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
98  offset += n ;
99  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, offset );
100  }
101  } else if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int16 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt16) {
102  uint16_t offset(0) ;
103  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
104  offset += n ;
105  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, offset );
106  }
107  } else if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int8 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt8) {
108  uint8_t offset(0) ;
109  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
110  offset += n ;
111  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, offset );
112  }
113  }
114 
115  }
116 
117  } else {
118  if(name == "types" ){
119  uint8_t type = (uint8_t) m_type ;
120  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i)
121  genericIO::flushASCII(str, type );
122 
123  } else if(name == "offsets" ){
124  uint8_t n = vtk::getElementNodeCount(m_type) ;
125  if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int64 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt64) {
126  uint64_t offset(0) ;
127  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
128  offset += n ;
129  genericIO::flushASCII(str, offset );
130  }
131  } else if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int32 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt32) {
132  uint32_t offset(0) ;
133  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
134  offset += n ;
135  genericIO::flushASCII(str, offset );
136  }
137  } else if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int16 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt16) {
138  uint16_t offset(0) ;
139  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
140  offset += n ;
141  genericIO::flushASCII(str, offset );
142  }
143  } else if (connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::Int8 || connectivityDataType == VTKDataType::UInt8) {
144  uint8_t offset(0) ;
145  for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nCells; ++i){
146  offset += n ;
147  genericIO::flushASCII(str, offset );
148  }
149  }
150 
151  }
152 
153  }
154 
155 }
156 
173 VTKUnstructuredGrid::VTKUnstructuredGrid( VTKElementType elementType ) :VTK() {
174 
175  m_fh.setAppendix("vtu");
176 
177  int nGeomFields = 6;
178 
179  m_geometry.resize(nGeomFields);
180 
181  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS)] = VTKField("Points") ;
182  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::OFFSETS)] = VTKField("offsets") ;
183  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::TYPES)] = VTKField("types") ;
184  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY)] = VTKField("connectivity") ;
185  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS)] = VTKField("faces") ;
186  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS)] = VTKField("faceoffsets") ;
187 
188  for( auto & field : m_geometry ){
189  field.setLocation( VTKLocation::CELL ) ;
190  field.setFieldType( VTKFieldType::KNOWN_BY_CLASS ) ;
191  field.setDataType( VTKDataType::Int32 ) ;
192  field.setCodification(m_geomCodex);
193  }
194 
195  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS)].setLocation( VTKLocation::POINT ) ;
196  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS)].setFieldType( VTKFieldType::VECTOR ) ;
197  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS)].setDataType( VTKDataType::Float64 ) ;
198 
199  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS)].disable();
200  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS)].disable();
201 
202  m_nConnectivityEntries = 0;
203  m_nFaceStreamEntries = 0;
204 
205  setElementType(elementType);
206 
207 }
208 
216 VTKUnstructuredGrid::VTKUnstructuredGrid( const std::string &dir, const std::string &name, VTKElementType elementType ):VTKUnstructuredGrid( elementType ){
217 
218  setNames( dir, name ) ;
219 
220 }
221 
227 void VTKUnstructuredGrid::setElementType( VTKElementType elementType ){
228 
229  m_elementType = elementType ;
230  if ( m_elementType == VTKElementType::UNDEFINED ) {
231  return;
232  }
233 
234  // Set homogeneous info streamer properties
235  m_homogeneousInfoStreamer.setElementType( m_elementType );
236  m_homogeneousInfoStreamer.setConnectivityField( &(m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY)]) );
237 
238  // Types
239  int types_gid = getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::TYPES);
240  m_geometry[types_gid].setDataType( VTKDataType::UInt8) ;
241  m_geometry[types_gid].setStreamer(m_homogeneousInfoStreamer) ;
242 
243  // Offsets
244  if ( m_elementType != VTKElementType::POLYGON && m_elementType != VTKElementType::POLYHEDRON) {
245  int offsets_gid = getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::OFFSETS);
246  m_geometry[offsets_gid].setStreamer(m_homogeneousInfoStreamer) ;
247  }
248 
249 }
250 
259 void VTKUnstructuredGrid::setDimensions( uint64_t ncells, uint64_t npoints, uint64_t nconn, uint64_t nfacestream ){
260 
261  // Grid size
262  m_points = npoints ;
263 
264  m_cells = ncells ;
265  if ( m_elementType != VTKElementType::UNDEFINED ) {
266  m_homogeneousInfoStreamer.setCellCount( ncells );
267  }
268 
269  // Connectivity
270  bool unevenConnectivity = false;
271  unevenConnectivity |= ( m_elementType == VTKElementType::UNDEFINED ) ;
272  unevenConnectivity |= ( m_elementType == VTKElementType::POLYGON ) ;
273  unevenConnectivity |= ( m_elementType == VTKElementType::POLYHEDRON ) ;
274 
275  if ( unevenConnectivity ) {
276  m_nConnectivityEntries = nconn ;
277  } else {
278  m_nConnectivityEntries = m_cells *vtk::getElementNodeCount( m_elementType ) ;
279  }
280 
281  assert( (m_cells != 0 && m_nConnectivityEntries != 0) || (m_cells == 0 && m_nConnectivityEntries == 0) );
282 
283  // Face stream
284  bool faceSteamEnabled = false;
285  faceSteamEnabled |= ( m_elementType == VTKElementType::POLYGON ) ;
286  faceSteamEnabled |= ( m_elementType == VTKElementType::POLYHEDRON ) ;
287  faceSteamEnabled |= ( m_elementType == VTKElementType::UNDEFINED && nfacestream > 0 ) ;
288 
289  if ( faceSteamEnabled ) {
290  m_nFaceStreamEntries = nfacestream ;
291 
292  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS)].enable();
293  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS)].enable();
294  } else {
295  m_nFaceStreamEntries = 0 ;
296 
297  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS)].disable();
298  m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS)].disable();
299  }
300 
301 }
302 
308 void VTKUnstructuredGrid::setGeomData( VTKUnstructuredField fieldEnum, VTKBaseStreamer *streamer ){
309 
310  int index = getFieldGeomId(fieldEnum) ;
311  VTKField& field = m_geometry[index] ;
312 
313  field.setStreamer( *streamer ) ;
314 
315 }
316 
321 uint64_t VTKUnstructuredGrid::readConnectivityEntries( ){
322 
323  uint64_t nconn(0) ;
324 
325  std::fstream str ;
326  std::fstream::pos_type position_appended;
327  std::string line;
328  char c_ ;
329  uint32_t nbytes32 ;
330  uint64_t nbytes64 ;
331 
332  // Geometry id of the connectivity
333  int connectivity_gid = getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY);
334  if(connectivity_gid < 0) return nconn;
335 
336  if(!m_geometry[connectivity_gid].hasAllMetaData() || !m_geometry[connectivity_gid].isEnabled()){
337  throw std::runtime_error("VTKUnstructuredGrid::readConnectivityEntries. Connectivity field is missing meta information or disabled");
338  }
339 
340  if( m_geometry[connectivity_gid].getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED ){
341  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary ) ;
342  //Go to the initial position of the appended section
343  while( getline(str, line) && (! bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, "<AppendedData")) ){}
344  str >> c_;
345  while( c_ != '_') str >> c_;
346  position_appended = str.tellg();
347  str.close();
348  }
349 
350  //Open in binary for read
351  if( m_geometry[connectivity_gid].getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED ){
352  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
353  str.seekg( position_appended) ;
354  str.seekg( m_geometry[connectivity_gid].getOffset(), std::ios::cur) ;
355 
356  int dataSize = VTKTypes::sizeOfType( m_geometry[connectivity_gid].getDataType() ) ;
357  assert(dataSize > 0) ;
358 
359  if( m_headerType== "UInt32") {
360  genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes32 ) ;
361  nconn = nbytes32 / dataSize ;
362  }
363 
364  if( m_headerType== "UInt64") {
365  genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes64 ) ;
366  nconn = nbytes64 / dataSize ;
367  }
368  str.close();
369  }
370 
371 
372 
373  //Open in ascii for read
374  if( m_geometry[connectivity_gid].getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII ){
375  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
376  str.seekg( m_geometry[connectivity_gid].getPosition() ) ;
377 
378  std::string line ;
379  std::vector<uint64_t> temp;
380 
381  nconn = 0 ;
382 
383  getline( str, line) ;
384  while( ! bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString(line,"/DataArray") ) {
385  temp.clear() ;
386  bitpit::utils::string::convertString( line, temp) ;
387  nconn += temp.size() ;
388  getline( str, line) ;
389  }
390 
391  str.close();
392  }
393 
394  return nconn ;
395 
396 }
397 
402 uint64_t VTKUnstructuredGrid::readFaceStreamEntries( ){
403  uint64_t nface(0) ;
404  std::fstream str ;
405  std::fstream::pos_type position_appended;
406  std::string line;
407  char c_ ;
408  uint32_t nbytes32 ;
409  uint64_t nbytes64 ;
410 
411  // Geometry id of the facestream
412  int facestream_gid = getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS);
413  if(facestream_gid < 0 ) return nface;
414  if(!m_geometry[facestream_gid].hasAllMetaData() || !m_geometry[facestream_gid].isEnabled()) return nface;
415 
416  if( m_geometry[facestream_gid].getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED ){
417  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary ) ;
418  //Go to the initial position of the appended section
419  while( getline(str, line) && (! bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, "<AppendedData")) ){}
420  str >> c_;
421  while( c_ != '_') str >> c_;
422  position_appended = str.tellg();
423  str.close();
424  }
425 
426  //Open in binary for read
427  if( m_geometry[facestream_gid].getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED ){
428  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
429  str.seekg( position_appended) ;
430  str.seekg( m_geometry[facestream_gid].getOffset(), std::ios::cur) ;
431 
432  int dataSize = VTKTypes::sizeOfType( m_geometry[facestream_gid].getDataType() ) ;
433  assert(dataSize > 0) ;
434 
435  if( m_headerType== "UInt32") {
436  genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes32 ) ;
437  nface = nbytes32 / dataSize ;
438  }
439 
440  if( m_headerType== "UInt64") {
441  genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes64 ) ;
442  nface = nbytes64 / dataSize ;
443  }
444  }
445 
446  //Open in ASCII for read
447  if( m_geometry[facestream_gid].getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII ){
448  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary );
449  str.seekg( m_geometry[facestream_gid].getPosition() ) ;
450 
451  std::string line ;
452  std::vector<uint64_t> temp;
453 
454  nface = 0 ;
455 
456  getline( str, line) ;
457  while( ! bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString(line,"/DataArray") ) {
458  temp.clear() ;
459  bitpit::utils::string::convertString( line, temp) ;
460  nface += temp.size() ;
461  getline( str, line) ;
462  }
463 
464  str.close();
465  }
466 
467  return nface ;
468 }
469 
473 void VTKUnstructuredGrid::writeMetaInformation( ){
474 
475  std::fstream str ;
476 
477  //Since we are writing only ASCII information (without retrieving stream
478  //position with seekg/tellg) it is safe to open it in text/ASCII mode.
479  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::out ) ;
480  if (!str.is_open()) {
481  throw std::runtime_error("Cannot create file \"" + m_fh.getName() + "\"" + " inside the directory \"" + m_fh.getDirectory() + "\"");
482  }
483 
484  //Writing XML header
485  str << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>" << std::endl;
486 
487  //Writing Piece Information
488  str << "<VTKFile type=\"UnstructuredGrid\" version=\"1.0\" byte_order=\"LittleEndian\" header_type=\"" << m_headerType << "\">" << std::endl;
489  str << " <UnstructuredGrid>" << std::endl;;
490  str << " <Piece NumberOfPoints=\"" << m_points << "\" NumberOfCells=\"" << m_cells << "\">" << std::endl;
491 
492  //Header for Data
493  writeDataHeader( str, false );
494 
495  //Wring Geometry Information
496  str << " <Points>" << std::endl ;;
497  writeDataArray( str, m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS)] ) ;
498  str << " </Points>" << std::endl;
499 
500  str << " <Cells>" << std::endl ;;
501  writeDataArray( str, m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::OFFSETS)] ) ;
502  writeDataArray( str, m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::TYPES)] ) ;
503  writeDataArray( str, m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY)] ) ;
504  if (m_nFaceStreamEntries) {
505  writeDataArray( str, m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS)] ) ;
506  writeDataArray( str, m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS)] ) ;
507  }
508  str << " </Cells>" << std::endl;
509 
510  //Closing Piece
511  str << " </Piece>" << std::endl;
512  str << " </UnstructuredGrid>" << std::endl;
513 
514  //Appended Section
515 
516  str << " <AppendedData encoding=\"raw\">" << std::endl;
517  str << "_" ;
518  str << std::endl ;
519  str << "</VTKFile>" << std::endl;
520 
521  str.close() ;
522 
523 }
524 
529 void VTKUnstructuredGrid::writeCollection( ){
530 
531  std::fstream str ;
532 
533  FileHandler fhp, fho ;
534 
535  fhp = m_fh ;
536  fho = m_fh ;
537 
538  fhp.setParallel(false) ;
539  fhp.setAppendix("pvtu") ;
540 
541  fho.setDirectory(".") ;
542 
543  str.open( fhp.getPath( ), std::ios::out ) ;
544  if (!str.is_open()) {
545  throw std::runtime_error("Cannot create file \"" + fhp.getName() + "\"" + " inside the directory \"" + fhp.getDirectory() + "\"");
546  }
547 
548  //Writing XML header
549  str << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>" << std::endl;
550 
551  //Writing Piece Information
552  str << "<VTKFile type=\"PUnstructuredGrid\" version=\"0.1\" byte_order=\"LittleEndian\">" << std::endl;
553  str << " <PUnstructuredGrid GhostLevel=\"0\">" << std::endl;;
554 
555  //Header for Data
556  writeDataHeader( str, true );
557 
558  //Wring Geometry Information
559  str << " <PPoints>" << std::endl;
560  writePDataArray( str, m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS)] ) ;
561  str << std::endl ;
562  str << " </PPoints>" << std::endl;
563 
564 
565  for( int i=0; i<m_procs; i++){
566  fho.setBlock(i) ;
567  str << " <Piece Source=\"" << fho.getPath() << "\"/>" << std::endl;
568  }
569 
570  str << " </PUnstructuredGrid>" << std::endl;
571  str << "</VTKFile>" << std::endl;
572 
573  str.close() ;
574 
575 
576 }
577 
582 void VTKUnstructuredGrid::readMetaInformation( ){
583 
584  std::fstream str;
585  std::string line, temp;
586 
587  std::fstream::pos_type position;
588 
589  //Although we are not explicit calling seekg/tellg on the stream, we still
590  //need to open the file in binary mode because this mode is needed by the
591  //for reading data array information.
592  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary ) ;
593 
594  getline( str, line);
595  while( ! bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, "<VTKFile")){
596  getline(str, line);
597  }
598 
599  if( bitpit::utils::string::getAfterKeyword( line, "header_type", '\"', temp) ){
600  setHeaderType( temp) ;
601  }
602 
603  while( ! bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, "<Piece")){
604  getline(str, line);
605  }
606 
607  bitpit::utils::string::getAfterKeyword( line, "NumberOfPoints", '\"', temp) ;
608  bitpit::utils::string::convertString( temp, m_points );
609 
610  bitpit::utils::string::getAfterKeyword( line, "NumberOfCells", '\"', temp) ;
611  bitpit::utils::string::convertString( temp, m_cells );
612 
613 
614  position = str.tellg() ;
615  readDataHeader( str ) ;
616 
617  // Read metadata information
618  for( auto &field : m_geometry ){
619  str.seekg( position) ;
620  if( ! readDataArray( str, field ) ) {
621 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
622  log::cout() <<"Geometry field " << field.getName() << " not found, it will be disabled" << std::endl ;
623 #endif
624  field.disable();
625  }
626  }
627 
628 
629  str.close() ;
630 
631  if( m_elementType == VTKElementType::UNDEFINED) {
632  setDimensions( m_cells, m_points, readConnectivityEntries(), readFaceStreamEntries() ) ;
633  } else {
634  // Metadata information read form file may not match the information
635  // set in our own streamer. If the grid is homogeneous, we need to
636  // reset all metadata that can't be overwritten.
637  setElementType(m_elementType) ;
638 
639  // Set the dimension of the grid
640  setDimensions( m_cells, m_points ) ;
641  }
642 
643 
644 }
645 
650 uint64_t VTKUnstructuredGrid::calcConnectivityEntries( ){
651 
652  return calcFieldEntries( m_geometry[getFieldGeomId(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY)] ) ;
653 }
654 
660 uint64_t VTKUnstructuredGrid::calcFieldSize( const VTKField &field ){
661 
662  uint64_t bytes = calcFieldEntries(field) ;
663  bytes *= VTKTypes::sizeOfType( field.getDataType() ) ;
664 
665  return bytes ;
666 
667 }
668 
674 uint64_t VTKUnstructuredGrid::calcFieldEntries( const VTKField &field ){
675 
676  uint64_t entries(0) ;
677  std::string name( field.getName() ) ;
678 
679  if( name == "Points" ){
680  entries = m_points *static_cast<int>(VTKFieldType::VECTOR) ;
681 
682  } else if( name == "offsets" ){
683  entries = m_cells ;
684 
685  } else if( name == "types" ){
686  entries = m_cells ;
687 
688  } else if( name == "connectivity"){
689  entries = m_nConnectivityEntries ;
690 
691  } else if( name == "faces"){
692  entries = m_nFaceStreamEntries ;
693 
694  } else if( name == "faceoffsets"){
695  entries = m_cells ;
696 
697  } else{
698 
699  VTKLocation location( field.getLocation() ) ;
700  assert( location != VTKLocation::UNDEFINED) ;
701 
702  if( location == VTKLocation::CELL ){
703  entries = m_cells ;
704 
705  } else if( location == VTKLocation::POINT ){
706  entries = m_points ;
707 
708  }
709 
710  VTKFieldType fieldType( field.getFieldType() ) ;
711  assert( fieldType != VTKFieldType::UNDEFINED) ;
712 
713  entries *= static_cast<uint64_t>(fieldType) ;
714 
715  }
716 
717  return entries ;
718 
719 }
720 
726 uint8_t VTKUnstructuredGrid::calcFieldComponents( const VTKField &field ){
727 
728  uint8_t comp ;
729  std::string name( field.getName() ) ;
730 
731  if( name == "Points" ){
732  comp = static_cast<int>(VTKFieldType::VECTOR) ;
733 
734  } else if( name == "offsets" ){
735  comp = 1 ;
736 
737  } else if( name == "types" ){
738  comp = 1 ;
739 
740  } else if( name == "connectivity" ){
741  if( m_elementType != VTKElementType::UNDEFINED){
742  comp = vtk::getElementNodeCount( m_elementType ) ;
743 
744  } else {
745  comp = 1;
746 
747  }
748 
749  } else if( name == "faces" ){
750  comp = 1 ;
751 
752  } else if( name == "faceoffsets" ){
753  comp = 1 ;
754 
755  } else{
756 
757  VTKFieldType fieldType( field.getFieldType() ) ;
758  assert( fieldType != VTKFieldType::UNDEFINED) ;
759 
760  comp = static_cast<uint8_t>(fieldType) ;
761 
762  }
763 
764  return comp ;
765 
766 }
767 
773 int VTKUnstructuredGrid::getFieldGeomId( VTKUnstructuredField field ){
774 
775  return static_cast<std::underlying_type<VTKElementType>::type>(field) ;
776 }
777 
778 }
